\n
\n
Love Codazon Toys! When I place an order the rep is so friendly and helpful. On a recent order I had to call back and change the address but didn't have it right away. Called back in the morning and The rep was very helpful in changing the address As I put a hold on shipping.
\n
\n
\n
\n
Amanda Robinson
\n
\n
"},{"content":"
\n
\n
Love Codazon Toys! The employees are very happy to help and give suggestions. The events they do to bring people in all over the community are wonderful!\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
Daniel Radcliffe
\n
\n
"},{"content":"
\n
\n
So much variety and the employees are always helpful. My daughter loves to be able to play and try out many of the toys before we buy them, we love Codazon Toys!\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
Stephanie
\n
\n
"}]"}}]}]}]},{"type":"container","settings":{"container_type":"box","class":"space-lg","id":"","style":"","background":"","attach_to_section_menu":"0","hide_on":"","section_menu_icon":"","title":""},"children":[{"type":"html","settings":{"title":"Featured Brands","content":"
